Perceptor/Nightlight:

Nightlight finally woke up. The downloaded program had done some 
changes. Now her eyes were golden instead cyan and her sweet smile 
was erased now she had a beauty and cold face.

"It's a plesure to see that you woke up... Blackstorm"smiled 
Perceptor "Now follow me, we have to receive our leader Hydras"

The femme nodded and and followed Perceptor without word while the 
male opened his com link to Hydras and said "MAster Hydras, the 
sleepy beauty has awaken... we'm waitting you in entrace I have to 
tell you something about some affairs..."

They walked towards the entrace, but they didn't left the base.
